Row.Text: Viking Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Stave Church and Longhouse in the same District.+1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every Unique Tradition in the Government. Ageless.
+1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every Unique Tradition in the Government.
Grants a Great Work Slot. Additional Happiness for each adjacent Forest and Taiga Tile.
Viking Unique Happiness Building. Grants a Great Work Slot. Additional Happiness for each adjacent Forest and Taiga Tile.
Viking Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Naust and Fishing Quay in the same District. +1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every Unique Tradition in the Government. Ageless.
+1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every Unique Tradition in the Government.
+5[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. Restores movement to any Viking Unit at its location. Ageless. Must be placed on an on Coast or Navigable River.
Viking Unique Gold Building. Restores movement to any Viking Unit at its location. Ageless. Must be placed on an Coast or Navigable River.
